long_description: OnGuard Doberman Combination cable lock boasts an integrated combo lock, making it a convenient, all-in-one option for securing your bike. The 6 ft. long, 12mm thick cable is made of heavy-duty, braided steel to offer good cut resistance and is self-coiling for convenience; vinyl coating helps protect finishes. Integrated, resettable 4-digit combination lock has 10,000 possible variations; lock is permanently forged to the cable for added security. Includes a versatile mounting bracket and rip-and-stick retention strap for hassle-free transportation. OnGuard rates the Doberman Combination cable lock as a 40 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: OnGuard Doberman Combination cable lock boasts an integrated combo lock, making it a convenient, all-in-one option for securing your bike.
